title: Is Tom Brady the GOAT? (Podcast)
itunes:title: Is Tom Brady the GOAT? (Podcast)
description:
Super Bowl LV is in the books and our crew breaks down the big game. Jason Kelly, Michael Barr and Richard Trueman discuss the winners and losers of Super Bowl LV, Tom Brady’s legacy and how the NFL made it through the covid-19 season. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
